basic_info.description: I'm a software engineer based in the DFW area. I have always been drawn to technology and innovation, and after graduating from the University of North Texas in the spring of 2022, I took the leap and transitioned from the healthcare industry to start my tech journey that summer. As a detail-oriented person, I have a passion for designing, developing, and maintaining websites and mobile applications and ensure that every aspect I bring is top-notch and user-friendly. In my free time, I love to hang out with friends/family, try new foods, travel, journal, and play video games! I also love everything Studio Ghibli :)

projects.title: PlateMate
projects.description: Created a Yelp-like application using the YelpAPI. It includes a filter function that allows users to narrow down restaurant choices based on a questionnaire. Each restaurant detail page displays important information such as reviews, location, and pictures, making it easier for users to choose a restaurant that fits their needs.

projects.title: CarCar
projects.description: Developed to manage various aspects of an automobile dealership including inventory, service center, and sales. It allows users to create, view, and delete services based on the automobile. Additionally, the application has a feature of VIP status, which is implemented for automobiles that have been serviced more than once.

projects.title: Task Manager
projects.description: Designed to help users manage their tasks efficiently. It has user-focused features such as login, logout, and signup that make it easy for users to access and utilize the app. With this app, users can edit, create, and delete certain tasks, making it more organized to manage what needs to be done.
